Reviews.Title: Not a good camera
Reviews.Author: Unhappy
Reviews.Content: The shutter button only works half the time, was a gift for a kid, not worth it. Very disappointed. :-(

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: Amy M. Weyer
Reviews.Content: Was not what I was expecting.  The color was not pink and the screen on the back was the size of a postage stamp.

Reviews.Title: Negative
Reviews.Author: D. Greene "Lady Dumplin"
Reviews.Content: This camera is horrible as is the quality. My % year old loves to take pictures and I thought this would be a great starter camera but I was wrong

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes software for editing and organizing
Takes up to 75 photos
Can be used as a webcam
ProductInfo.Name: Kidz Digital Camera
